entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
